name: pgbackups
desc: manage backups of heroku postgresql databases

subcommands.name: pgbackups:capture [DATABASE]
subcommands.desc: capture a backup from a database id

subcommands.name: pgbackups:restore [<DATABASE> [BACKUP_ID|BACKUP_URL]]
subcommands.desc: restore a backup to a database

subcommands.name: pgbackups:url [BACKUP_ID]
subcommands.desc: get a temporary URL for a backup
